properties.areaDesc: Chandeleur Sound; Coastal waters from Southwest Pass of the Mississippi River to Port Fourchon Louisiana from 20 to 60 NM; Coastal Waters from Port Fourchon LA to Lower Atchafalaya River LA out 20 nm; Coastal waters from the Southwest Pass of the Mississippi River to Port Fourchon Louisiana out 20 NM; Coastal waters from Pascagoula Mississippi to Stake Island out 20 NM; Coastal waters from Port Fourchon Louisiana to Lower Atchafalaya River LA from 20 to 60 NM
properties.headline: Special Marine Warning issued January 11 at 9:57AM CST until January 11 at 11:30AM CST by NWS New Orleans LA
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in New Orleans has issued a

* Special Marine Warning for...
Chandeleur Sound...
Coastal Waters from Port Fourchon LA to Lower Atchafalaya River LA
out 20 nm...
Coastal waters from Pascagoula Mississippi to Stake Island out 20
NM...
Coastal waters from Port Fourchon Louisiana to Lower Atchafalaya
River LA from 20 to 60 NM...
Coastal waters from Southwest Pass of the Mississippi River to Port
Fourchon Louisiana from 20 to 60 NM...
Coastal waters from the Southwest Pass of the Mississippi River to
Port Fourchon Louisiana out 20 NM...

* Until 1130 AM CST.

* At 957 AM CST, strong thunderstorms were located along a line
extending from near Barataria Bay to 29 nm southeast of Ship Shoal
295, moving east at 30 knots.

HAZARD...Wind gusts 34 knots or greater.

SOURCE...Radar.

IMPACT...Expect wind gusts in excess of 34 knots and suddenly
higher waves. Boats could sustain damage or capsize. Make
sure all on board are wearing life jackets. Return to
safe harbor if possible.

* Locations impacted include...
Barataria Bay, Grand Isle and Louisiana Offshore Oil Port.
properties.instruction:
A Tornado Watch remains in effect until noon CST for southeastern
Louisiana...and the adjacent coastal waters. A Tornado Watch also
remains in effect until 400 PM CST for the adjacent coastal waters.

Move to safe harbor immediately as gusty winds and high waves are
expected.
